DOC.brief_summary: Hypothesis : Exercise reduce morbidity mortality rate elderly population . The extent reduction intensity dependent . As part `` Generation 100 '' study , sub-study project investigate effect exercise blood volume , cardiopulmonary health heart function healthy age . Objective determine acute effect one endurance training session blood volume healthy elderly . The work hypothesis one interval training session increase total blood volume 10 % healthy elderly , change moderate continuous training .
DOC.brief_title: Generation 100 : Blood Volume Cardiac Function Healthy Aging
DOC.criteria: ability walk least 1km , bear 1938,1939,1940,1941 1942 Sufficiently good health able take part study , determine researcher Illness disability precludes exercise hinders completion study Uncontrolled hypertension Symptomatic valve disease , hyper tropic cardiomyopathy unstable angina Active cancer Test result indicate study participation unsafe Inclusion study conflict participation one
